name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-oriented Senior Engineer with 8 years of experience specializing in **TypeScript**, **React**, and **Node.js**, with a strong foundation in developing enterprise-grade applications. Proficient in employing **CI/CD** practices and Agile methodologies to ensure efficient deployment and project management. Demonstrated expertise in designing scalable systems utilizing **Postgres** and **Redis**, while fostering collaboration and communication among cross-functional teams.
Additionally, I leverage modern technologies such as **GraphQL** for seamless data fetching and management, and I’m committed to optimizing performance in high-demand environments. My background in full-stack development includes significant experience with **Python** and **Flutter**, along with proficiency in integrating AI/ML capabilities into applications. I have hands-on experience in the cloud with **AWS** and **Azure**, as well as implementing secure, compliant solutions for healthcare and finance sectors using protocols like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.
